name: Winston's World
description:
A browser-based 2D platforming game. Made for DMC 1000 (Foundations of Digital Media) at the University of Cincinnati in Fall 2019.

Credits
  • Hayden Schiff – Programming
  • Nick Klawitter – Level Design, Character Art
  • Charles Harte – Script, Composing, Sound Design
  • Patsy Schomaeker – Tile and Background Art

Additional assets by Kenney.nl, Void, egordorichev
Powered by Phaser 3 – made by Richard Davey

Source code available on GitHub
